attributes.action: Andy James Nelson Reality TV talent show judge
attributes.additional_details: We believe that Andy James Nelson (@andyjamesnelson) should be a judge on a reality TV style Talent Show. The only way we could possibly magnify his contribution to the world would be to put him on the X Factor, and possibly have him create a new boy band. It doesn't have to be the X Factor, it could be any existing format, or a new vehicle just for Andy James Nelson. Either would be good.
